text: Claudie André-Deshays Haigneré (born 13 May 1957) is a French doctor, politician, and former astronaut. She was a member of the Centre National d'Études Spatiales (1985–1999) and the European Space Agency (1999–2002). She was born in Le Creusot, France. She is also the CEO of France Telecom. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Astronauts Category:French businesspeople Category:French physicians Category:Politicians from Bourgogne-Franche-Comté Category:French scientists Category:People from Saône-et-Loire
title: Claudie Haigneré
